animeDescription: A biographical sketch of the life and ideals of Hijikata Toshizou, Vice Commander of the Shinsengumi, fighting to uphold the Shogunate during the Meiji revolution. (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Uratani, Chie', 'Director, Storyboard, Animation Director, Character Design'], ['Nomura, Kazuya', 'Key Animation'], ['Itou, Nobutake', 'Key Animation'], ['Hori, Motonobu', 'Key Animation']]
